post:
Hi,
I got this offer from Godaddy:
SPECIAL OFFER: NEW .COMs for C**$3.09***. Up To 3 Per Customer.
Plus ICANN fee of C**$0.18** **per domain** name per year for .COM. Applies to the first year only of up to three new registrations per customer. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer, sale, discount or promotion. Customers may not use gift cards, PayPal, or AliPay to redeem this offer. Offer expires after 10,000 redemptions or at 11:59 PM (Mountain Time) on 3/31/2013 or at Go Daddy's discretion (whichever comes first). **Offer valid for residents of the U.S. and Canada only**. 

Code: SMFB299
